title: Cross-chain Asset Transfer Standard
description: Currently there exists no standard for token transfer interoperability bridges between Cardano and other chains (L1s and sidechains).
solution: We will create a metadata standard which will allow developers to unify their interoperability bridges interfaces.
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
